name: Interactive Dynamic Kinetics
description:
Welcome to  Interactive Dynamics Kinetics Laboratory

Players take control of  Adrian, a test subject of IDK Labs, as they take control of the R.A.T. cybernetic  arm  to find their way out of their high-tech prison. Along the  way you encounter a menacing AI and malicious scientists  who will stop at nothing to keep you within their grasp.

Use  the Freeze, Launch, and Scale abilities with your cybernetic arm to solve your way through the sprawling laboratory. 

Experience this puzzle-platformer in VR.
